channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Inside Starbucks CEO Brian Niccol’s nascent turnaround plan—and why it’s working
item.description: Also: All the news and watercooler chat from Fortune.

item.title: As billionaires chase immortality, this startup cofounded by a Harvard genetics professor gets FDA approval for the first partial de-aging human trial
item.description: Life Biosciences will test its gene therapy designed to partially reset a cell’s age and potentially reverse vision loss in patients with glaucoma and...

item.title: Are you a cyborg, a centaur, or a self-automator? Why businesses need the right kind of ‘humans in the loop’ in AI
item.description: The 'human-in-the-loop' approach manifests in three radically different ways, with profound implications for performance and skill development.

item.title: Indonesia exchange CEO steps down as MSCI reform pressure mounts
item.description: It's been a volatile week for Indonesian assets after MSCI flagged concerns about transparency in Southeast Asia’s biggest market.

item.title: $100 million-plus funding rounds used to be incredibly rare. Now, 40% of seed and Series A rounds are clearing that bar
item.description: The mind-numbing math pushing AI funding rounds into the stratosphere.
